body_html:
Failed to build for me with the following error:

ERROR: /home/dmikushin/.cache/bazel/_bazel_dmikushin/2e6790ed2400dd10dbcc3c8a7729de12/external/nccl_archive/BUILD:33:1: error while parsing .d file: /home/dmikushin/.cache/bazel/_bazel_dmikushin/2e6790ed2400dd10dbcc3c8a7729de12/execroot/org_tensorflow/bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/external/nccl_archive/_objs/nccl/external/nccl_archive/src/core.cu.pic.d (No such file or directory)
nvcc fatal   : Unknown option 'iquote'
nvcc fatal   : Unknown option 'iquote'

Configured to compile with nvcc/gcc. I guess -iquote comes from clang

body:
Failed to build for me with the following error:

```
ERROR: /home/dmikushin/.cache/bazel/_bazel_dmikushin/2e6790ed2400dd10dbcc3c8a7729de12/external/nccl_archive/BUILD:33:1: error while parsing .d file: /home/dmikushin/.cache/bazel/_bazel_dmikushin/2e6790ed2400dd10dbcc3c8a7729de12/execroot/org_tensorflow/bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/external/nccl_archive/_objs/nccl/external/nccl_archive/src/core.cu.pic.d (No such file or directory)
nvcc fatal   : Unknown option 'iquote'
nvcc fatal   : Unknown option 'iquote'
```

Configured to compile with nvcc/gcc. I guess -iquote comes from clang
